summary: An email sent on August 11, 2019, reminding management at MCC New York that the Office of the Inspector General (OIG) must abide by the Master Agreement and respect employee Weingarten rights when conducting interviews. The sender inquires whether OIG is actively present and interviewing staff that day.

events.title: OIG Investigations at MCC New York
events.description: The Office of the Inspector General (OIG) is reportedly at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York conducting interviews of bargaining unit employees.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
keyFacts: On August 11, 2019, an inquiry was made about OIG conducting interviews at MCC New York.
The correspondence emphasizes that OIG must abide by the Master Agreement and respect employee Weingarten rights during questioning.
The email serves as a reminder to local management about proper procedures when employees are questioned.
The Local President determines the representative for an employee, not the agency or its representatives.
